value: BLU is a universal loyalty program that allows you to earn and redeem points instantly, any time and anywhere within the BLU network and on the BLU online catalog. The BLU network will include a wide range of BLU partners, like supermarkets, gas stations, electronic stores, travel agencies, banks and so on, where you will be able to earn BLU Points when you make a purchase. You can then redeem your BLU Points at any one of those partners or on the BLU online catalog. You will recognize a BLU partner whenever you see the BLU sign on the door or on the counter. In addition, if your bank is a BLU partner, you may be issued a BLU credit or debit card. This way, by using it when shopping within the BLU network, you will double the points you earn and you will be on your way to collecting points faster than ever! The BLU network will never stop growing and you will soon find us when you travel and shop abroad. Now that's an exciting loyalty program!

The BLU Points Loyalty (“Program”) is conscious of the nature of the information in its reach and endeavors to maintain confidentiality and privacy of this information as stipulated thereafter. This Privacy Policy aims to govern the manner by which information is either voluntarily or involuntarily collected. In addition to how the information is used, disclosed, maintained, and collected from all users (“Users”) in the course of the Program’s business under its parent company, affiliates, subsidiaries, partners and franchisees, information can be collected anytime Users interact within the Program such as when Users visit or access or browse the website, call or email the call centers, use mobile applications, use mobile websites, or use the products and services through our Program Partners.


Users include:

Members are individuals and customers of our Program Partners or independent members who have applied to join the BLU Points Program.

Program Partners are companies or entities which provide products and services to Members and have opted to be part of the BLU Points Program under agreement.


1 PURPOSE OF INFORMATION COLLECTED


The BLU Points Program offers Users the opportunity to issue, earn and redeem rewards using its loyalty network. In this process the Program will collect information on Users for the purpose of:

•Administering the Network

•Managing User’s accounts, to accurately record and update Points balances

•Recording and Processing User’s issuance and redemption of BLU Points

•Communicating product and service information, events, news and offers to Members

•Understanding Members’ needs, desires, and shopping preferences

•Analyzing Members’ preferences, needs, and behavioral patterns

•Marketing of products and services that interest Users

•Developing and enhancing products and services to meet User’s preferences and needs

•Engaging and participating of User’s in promotions, offers, draws, events, and surveys

•Improving Users overall experience and service, and responding to Users’ requests and needs.


2 COOKIES POLICY


The Program may automatically receive and store certain types of information whenever Users interact with the Program. The most common sources of this information include cookies, web beacons, pixel tags or clear Graphics Interchange Format files, known as GIFs. Examples of such information include User’s browser type, the type of operating system, the name of Internet service provider, pages visited on the Program. Users have the ability to accept or decline cookies. Most Web browsers accept cookies by default, though Users can usually modify their browser setting to decline cookies as a matter of preference. If Users choose to decline cookies, they may not be able to sign in or use other interactive features of the Program site and services that depend on cookies.


3 BROADCAST POLICY


By providing information in the process of joining the Program, through direct listing or enrollment by Program Partners, Members automatically and irrevocably agree to receive short message services (“SMS”), emails, multimedia, newsletters, notifications, images, clippings, or other various types of broadcast.


4 YOUR CONSENT TO THE PROGRAM’S PRIVACY POLICY


Users acknowledge, consent and agree to this Privacy Policy to receive and benefit from the BLU Points Loyalty Program.


5 USE AND DISCLOSURE OF INFORMATION


Except as otherwise stated below, the Program does not sell, trade or rent Users’ personally identifiable information collected to others. The information collected by the Program is used to process orders, to keep Users informed about their order status, to notify Users of products or special offers that may be of interest to them, and for statistical purposes to improve the Program. The Program will disclose Users’ personally identifiable information to third parties for order tracking purposes or process Users’ check or money order, as appropriate, fill Users’ order, improve its functionality, perform statistical and data analysis, deliver Users’ order and deliver promotional emails to Users. For example, the Program must release Users’ mailing address information to the delivery service to deliver products that Users ordered. All credit/debit cards’ details and personally identifiable information will NOT be stored, sold, shared, rented or leased to any third parties.


The Program may use non-personal "aggregated data" to enhance its operation or analyze interest in its areas. Moreover, the Program may in some circumstances disclose personally identifiable information to third parties to enhance Users’ experience. Additionally, if Users provide the Program with content for publishing or feedback, the Program may publish Users’ username or other identifying data with Users’ permission.


The Program may also disclose personally identifiable information in order to respond to a subpoena, court order or other such request. The Program may also provide such personally identifiable information in response to a law enforcement agencies request or as otherwise required by law. Users’ personally identifiable information may be provided to a party if the Program files for bankruptcy, or there is a transfer of the assets or ownership of the Program in connection with proposed or consummated corporate reorganizations, such as mergers or acquisitions.


6 PROGRAM PARTNER AND OTHER WEBSITES PRIVACY WAIVER


Program Partners may have access to transactional data in terms of products and services purchased, which they may utilize and analyze. The Program is not responsible or liable for information collected by the Program Partners.


7 SECURIY


The Program takes appropriate steps to ensure data privacy and security including through various hardware and software methodologies. However, the Program cannot guarantee the security of any information that is disclosed online.


8 MINORS


The Program does not knowingly collect personal information from minors under the age of 13. Minors are not permitted to use the Program’s website or services, and the Program requests minors under the age of 13 not to submit any personal information to the website. Since information regarding minors under the age of 13 is not collected, the Program does not knowingly distribute personal information regarding minors under the age of 13.


9 CORRECTIONS AND UPDATES


If Users wish to modify or update any information the Program has received, please contact info@blupoints.com.


10 PRIVACY POLICY MODIFICATIONS AND UPDATES


The Program may from time to time or as it deems necessary change, amend and update it Privacy Policy and Terms & Conditions. Therefore Users are encouraged to frequently visit these sections in order to be updated about the changes on the Program’s website at www.blupoints.com. Modifications will be effective on the day they are posted.


The Privacy Policy may also be amended as required by law in specific countries and jurisdictions.

MEMBERS


1	How do I enroll and become a Member in the BLU Points Program?


You can enroll by registering at any BLU participating merchant location – i.e. BLU Partner – or directly online through the BLU website at blupoints.com or through the BLU Mobile App.

2	When and how can I start earning BLU Points?


You can start earning BLU Points as soon as you register. From that point on inclusively you will be credited BLU Points every time you make a purchase at any BLU Partner location. Just make sure to remind the cashier at the checkout counter that you are a BLU Member!

3	Why is the number of BLU Points I earned relative to the money I spent different at times?


The number of points earned relative to the purchase amount will vary from one BLU Partner to another. Some BLU Partners may change the rate of rewarding of points from time to time and without prior notice. Also, the same BLU Partner might choose to reward their clients with more BLU Points for purchasing certain items, or shopping at certain locations. We advise checking directly with each BLU Partner for the details on how they give out BLU Points.


4	Can I earn BLU Points even if I don’t have my BLU Loyalty card with me?


Yes, you can claim BLU Points even if you don’t happen to carry your BLU Loyalty Card with you. You can earn BLU Points by either:-	using your registered mobile number-	providing your BLU Loyalty card number-	presenting an image of the barcode of your BLU card.


5	Do I get charged for enrolling in the BLU Points Program?


No, Membership in the BLU Points Program is FREE of charge.


6	When and how can I start redeeming my points?


You can start redeeming your BLU Points once your account is activated. You can redeem your BLU Points for any item at a BLU Partner location. You can also exchange your BLU Points for any item on the BLU Catalog available on blupoints.com or through the BLU Mobile App. To complete a redemption transaction you will need to enter your PIN Code when prompted.


7	How do I receive my PIN Code?


You will receive your PIN code via SMS the first time you register. Your new PIN Code is sent directly to your mobile number registered under your account. If subsequently you request a new PIN, it will also be sent to the mobile number on file. For this reason, please make sure that the mobile number registered under your account is correct and up to date at all times.


8	How do I activate my account?


Activating your account is really easy. Log into your account online at blupoints.com or on the BLU Mobile App, press the ACTIVATE MY ACCOUNT button and then enter your PIN code. You can also activate your account by using your PIN to complete a redemption transaction at any BLU Partner location.


9	Can I cancel my membership at any time?


Yes, you can choose to cancel your membership account at any time by logging into your account on blupoints.com or on the BLU Mobile App using your registered email address or mobile number and PIN.


10	Can I have other family members become Members of the BLU Points Program?


Yes, family and friends can enroll in the BLU Points Program, as long as they are 13 years of age and above.


11	How can I check my BLU Points balance?


You can check your BLU Points balance statement by logging into your account on blupoints.com or through the BLU Mobile App.


12	Can I update my profile and personal details?


Yes, you can update your profile and personal details by logging into your account on blupoints.com or through the BLU Mobile App. Once logged in, you can manage all your profile information, preferences and contact details. Members are encouraged to keep their profile information up to date to better benefit from the vast variety of rewards.


13	What happens if I lose or forget my PIN Code?


You can request BLU to generate a new PIN online on blupoints.com or through the BLU Mobile App. Alternatively, you can request a new PIN when completing a redemption transaction at any BLU Partner location.


14	How can I change my registered mobile number?


You can log into your account on blupoints.com or through the BLU Mobile App and make changes to your mobile phone number registered under your account, as well as other profile information and contact details.


15	For how long are my BLU Points valid?


Your BLU Points are valid for up to 3 years from the time they are credited to your account.


16	Can I transfer my BLU Points to another Member?


Yes, you can transfer your BLU Points, entirely or partially, to any other Member within the BLU Program.


17	Do I pay any fees for the transfer of BLU Points?


Yes, you will be charged a transfer fee equivalent to 5% of the amount of the points transferred or 100 (one hundred) BLU points, whichever is greater.


18	Can I earn and redeem BLU Points when I travel abroad?


You can earn and redeem BLU Points anywhere and anytime within the BLU network from any BLU Partner globally.


19	How can I accelerate my earnings of BLU Points?


To get the maximum number of BLU Points, ensure you claim them every time you make a purchase from a BLU Partner. Also, keep an eye on special offers and promotions. BLU Partners may reward you extra BLU Points for various things, such as purchasing specific items, shopping at a specified branch, entering a store at a particular time, and so on…


20	If I pay with a credit card issued by a BLU participating bank, would I earn more BLU Points?


Yes, if you are making a payment at a BLU Partner’s store and you are using a credit or debit card issued by a participating bank, you would be rewarded BLU Points by both the BLU Partner and the participating bank.


21	How can I know who the BLU Partners are?


You can visit blupoints.com or your BLU Mobile App on a regular basis to see the updated list of BLU Partners. All stores displaying the BLU logo on the door or on the checkout counter are part of the BLU network.


22	How do I know that I have been rewarded BLU Points upon a purchase from a BLU Partner?


Upon your purchase some BLU Partners will send you an SMS notifying you of the BLU Points earned from that transaction and your new balance. However, as this is not practiced by all BLU Partners, it is advisable for you to regularly check your BLU Points balance on blupoints.com or through the BLU Mobile App.


23	If BLU Points have not been credited to my account, what should I do?


It is a good practice to check your balance online and to keep track of the SMS notifications received from BLU Partners. In case you believe your earned BLU Points have not been credited properly to your account, you should first contact the BLU Partner where the transaction took place to clarify or adjust the inconsistency. If that does not resolve the issue, you can contact BLU directly at info@blupoints.com. Keep in mind that with some BLU Partners and participating banks, the crediting of the BLU Points is not immediate, and will take place at the end of your billing cycle (i.e. at the end of the month, or when you receive your billing statement).


24	I am not able to find the BLU Mobile App online – where is it?


The BLU Mobile App is shortly on its way. BLU will notify its Members when the BLU Mobile App will become available online for download.

25	How can I get help if I have questions that I cannot find in this FAQ?


You are welcome to contact our customer care at info@blupoints.com who would gladly assist you with any query you may have. Please allow 24 to 48 hours for a response.
